mapper.select: select bno ,title ,writer ,regdate ,viewcnt from board order by bno desc
mapper.insert: insert into board (bno, title, content, writer) values ((select nvl(max(bno)+1,1) from board), #{title},#{content},#{writer})
mapper.select: select bno ,title ,writer ,content ,regdate ,viewcnt from board where bno = #{bno}
mapper.update: update board set title=#{title},content=#{content} where bno =#{bno}
update board set viewcnt = viewcnt + 1 where bno = #{bno}
